    2. Tools

    Tools

    Mouse-driven tools allow interactive manipulation and analysis of your molecules.

    In general, tools share several features:

    • A scroll wheel will zoom the camera in or out.
    • A middle click can be emulated by holding down the Shift key while clicking.
    • A right click can be emulated by holding down the Control key while clicking.

    Avogadro includes many tools:

    Align Tool

    The align tool can be used to align molecules to a particular frame of reference.

    AutoOptimization Tool

    .

    AutoRotate Tool

    The AutoRotate tool allows you to continuously rotate a molecule in space, e.g. for a presentation.

    Bond Centric Manipulate Tool

    The bond-centric manipulation tool provides a “chemically-oriented” way to change bond lengths, angles, and dihedral angles.

    Draw Tool

    The draw tool is the principal way to build molecules.

    Manipulate Tool

    The manipulate tool allows you to move individual atoms or selected fragments in space.

    Measure Tool

    The measure tool allows you to measure distance, angles, or dihedral angles.

    Navigate Tool

    The navigate tool allows you to move the camera around the scene.

    Python Tool

    Selection Tool

    The select tool allows you to operate on sections of molecules.
